data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Tumbes, Peru by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tumbes, Peru
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Tumbes, Peru will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Tumbes.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Tumbes, Peru a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Cujareno, Mashco Piro people.
Jesus, please give your people in Tumbes, Peru a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Tumbes, Peru from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Tumbes.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.
